title: ● Has his human wife ever continued to live in Israel for Jehovah?
subtitle: Beafra has long claimed that a harsh lawsuit for royalties arose out of the desire of his former comrades to declare revenues.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: His teammates filed a lawsuit against the dead front man, Gilo Biafra, because he did not want one of their songs to be used in a Levi ad.
